articles.title: Humans may not have survived without Neanderthals - BBC.com
articles.description: A new DNA analysis has shown that the arrival of modern humans from Africa was far from smooth.
articles.content:
Scientists can tell how ancient human populations evovled by analysing their DNA
Far from triumphantly breezing out of Africa, modern humans went extinct many times before going on to populate the w… [+4439 chars]
